ValidationRule.description: BODEV-363: Prohibits package products from being deleted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($User.LastName, "Bypass")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")), ISCHANGED(of_package_products_cannot_be_deleted__c), PRIORVALUE(of_package_products_cannot_be_deleted__c) > of_package_products_cannot_be_deleted__c, Allow_Removing_Package_Products__c = False )
